modules.name: Math
modules.description: Numeric operations for calculations, rounding, clamping, and randomization.

operators.name: math/round
operators.description: Round to nearest integer or specified decimals

operators.name: math/lerp
operators.description: Linear interpolation between a and b by factor t

operators.name: math/map
operators.description: Map value from one range to another

operators.name: math/default
operators.description: Return default if value is null, undefined, or NaN

modules.name: String
modules.description: Text manipulation including formatting, splitting, trimming, and templating.

operators.name: str/split
operators.description: Split string into array by delimiter

operators.name: str/startsWith
operators.description: Check if string starts with prefix

operators.name: str/endsWith
operators.description: Check if string ends with suffix

operators.name: str/padStart
operators.description: Pad string from start to target length

operators.name: str/padEnd
operators.description: Pad string from end to target length

operators.name: str/default
operators.description: Return default if value is null/undefined/empty

modules.name: Array
modules.description: Work with lists and arrays including filtering, mapping, and aggregation.

operators.name: array/append
operators.description: Add item to end (returns new array)

operators.name: array/prepend
operators.description: Add item to start (returns new array)

operators.name: array/insert
operators.description: Insert item at index (returns new array)

operators.name: array/remove
operators.description: Remove item at index (returns new array)

operators.name: array/removeItem
operators.description: Remove first matching item (returns new array)

operators.name: array/indexOf
operators.description: Find index of item (-1 if not found)

operators.name: array/findIndex
operators.description: Find index of first element matching predicate (-1 if none)

operators.name: array/every
operators.description: Check if all elements match predicate

operators.name: array/some
operators.description: Check if any element matches predicate

operators.name: array/partition
operators.description: Split array by predicate into [matches, nonMatches]

modules.name: Object
modules.description: Access and manipulate object properties safely.

operators.name: object/set
operators.description: Set nested value by path (returns new object)

operators.name: object/empty?
operators.description: Check if object has no keys

modules.name: Time
modules.description: Work with dates, times, durations, and timestamps.

operators.name: time/day
operators.description: Get day of month from timestamp (1-31)

operators.name: time/isBefore
operators.description: Check if a is before b

operators.name: time/isAfter
operators.description: Check if a is after b

operators.name: time/isBetween
operators.description: Check if date is between start and end

operators.name: time/isSame
operators.description: Check if timestamps are same (optionally by unit)

operators.name: time/isPast
operators.description: Check if timestamp is in the past

operators.name: time/isFuture
operators.description: Check if timestamp is in the future

operators.name: time/relative
operators.description: Format as relative time ("2 hours ago", "in 3 days")

modules.name: Validate
modules.description: Validate user input with common patterns like email, required, length checks.

operators.name: validate/required
operators.description: Check if value is not null, undefined, or empty string

operators.name: validate/string
operators.description: Check if value is a string

operators.name: validate/number
operators.description: Check if value is a number

operators.name: validate/boolean
operators.description: Check if value is a boolean

operators.name: validate/array
operators.description: Check if value is an array

operators.name: validate/object
operators.description: Check if value is an object

operators.name: validate/email
operators.description: Check if value is a valid email format

operators.name: validate/url
operators.description: Check if value is a valid URL format

operators.name: validate/uuid
operators.description: Check if value is a valid UUID

operators.name: validate/phone
operators.description: Check if value is a valid phone number

operators.name: validate/creditCard
operators.description: Check if value is a valid credit card number (Luhn algorithm)

operators.name: validate/date
operators.description: Check if value is a valid date

operators.name: validate/minLength
operators.description: Check if string/array has minimum length

operators.name: validate/maxLength
operators.description: Check if string/array has maximum length

operators.name: validate/length
operators.description: Check if string/array has exact length

operators.name: validate/range
operators.description: Check if number is within range [min, max]

operators.name: validate/pattern
operators.description: Check if string matches regex pattern

operators.name: validate/oneOf
operators.description: Check if value is in list of allowed values

operators.name: validate/noneOf
operators.description: Check if value is not in list of disallowed values

operators.name: validate/check
operators.description: Run multiple validation rules, return { valid, errors }

modules.name: Format
modules.description: Display formatting for currency, numbers, dates, and file sizes.

operators.name: format/list
operators.description: Format array as natural language list

operators.name: format/creditCard
operators.description: Format credit card with masked digits

modules.name: Async
modules.description: Control timing with delays, debouncing, retries, and timeouts.

operators.name: async/debounce
operators.description: Debounce an event (wait for pause in events)

operators.name: async/throttle
operators.description: Throttle an event (emit at most once per interval)

operators.name: async/retry
operators.description: Retry an effect with configurable backoff

operators.name: async/race
operators.description: Execute effects in parallel, return first to complete

operators.name: async/all
operators.description: Execute effects in parallel, wait for all to complete

operators.name: async/sequence
operators.description: Execute effects in sequence (one after another)
